name: fireD (tigredeye, harel.don, giladbin, Bar Nemesh, shirlynitzan)
name_original: fireD (tigredeye, harel.don, giladbin, Bar Nemesh, shirlynitzan)
description:
fireD (tigredeye, harel.don, giladbin, Bar Nemesh, shirlynitzan) is a game developed by tigredeye, harel.don, giladbin and Bar Nemesh. It came out on 08-02-2023.
fireD (tigredeye, harel.don, giladbin, Bar Nemesh, shirlynitzan) is available on macOS and PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
